title: R package for GeoLocator Data Package
text: GeoLocatoR designed help create work GeoLocator Data Package (GeoLocator DP), standardized format geolocator data follows Data Package standard, ensuring data organized, accessible, ready share.

title: R package for GeoLocator Data Package
text: Creates GeoLocator Data Package: Create geolocator datapackage object, add resources (data), write data package preferred directory. , read existing data package directory Zenodo. Works Seamlessly GeoPressureTemplate: GeoLocatoR compatible GeoPressureTemplate ‚Äî template repository analyzing geolocator data using GeoPressureR. Use together streamline analysis maintain standardized project structure. Supports Swiss Ornithological Institute Data: Special functions designed deal internal SOI data. See vignette. Built frictionless-r: package built using frictionless-r package, adhering Frictionless Data standards open data.

title: R package for GeoLocator Data Package
text: Data Package lightweight format packaging data using Data Package standard. provides framework organizing data files, metadata, descriptive information consistent reusable manner. geolocator data, ensures information tagged birds, movements, associated metadata bundled single exchangeable package. Learn GeoLocator DP standard .

title: Add a Resource with Schema to a Package ‚Äî add_gldp_resource
text: package package object resource added. resource_name character string specifying name resource. name used locate schema file. data data frame containing data added resource. data frame adjusted according schema. cast_type logical value indicating whether data frame cast types specified schema. Defaults FALSE. replace TRUE, added resource replace existing resource name. delim Single character used separate fields CSV file(s), e.g. \t tab delimited file. set delimiter resource Table Dialect, read functions .  know read file(s).

text: updated package object new resource added.

title: Add a Resource with Schema to a Package ‚Äî add_gldp_resource
text: schema resource fetched JSON file located specified directory. function adjusts data frame according schema's fieldsMatch property: "equal": data frame must exactly fields defined schema. "subset": data frame must least fields defined schema, may additional fields. Fields present schema added schema. "superset": data frame may fields present schema, must include fields defined schema. "partial": data frame must least one field defined schema.

what: Create a GeoLocator Data Package ‚Äî create_gldp
title: Create a GeoLocator Data Package ‚Äî create_gldp
text: function create Data package GeoLocator data. function wrapper create_package() additional constrains following GeoLocatorDP. arguments functions correspond standard Data Package properties.

title: Create a GeoLocator Data Package ‚Äî create_gldp
code: create_gldp(   title,   contributors,   schema = NULL,   name = NULL,   id = NULL,   licenses = list(list(name = "CC-BY-4.0", title = "Creative Commons Attribution 4.0",     path = "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/")),   description = NULL,   homepage = NULL,   image = NULL,   version = NULL,   embargo = "1970-01-01",   keywords = NULL,   citation = NULL,   grants = NULL,   related_identifiers = NULL,   references = NULL )

title: Create a GeoLocator Data Package ‚Äî create_gldp
text: title string providing title one sentence description package. plain text (markup), capitalised like title, end period less 65 characters. See Geolocator DP thw Data Package specification. contributors list contributors, contributor list properties including leas title also optionally givenName, familyName, path, email, roles, organization. See Geolocator DP, Data Package specification R Packages. schema (optional) URL JSON Table Schema describes data package. Defaults GeoLocator Data Package profile. See Data Package specification . name (optional) string providing name package. Defaults slugified version title. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. id globally unique identifier package, UUID DOI. Defaults NULL. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. licenses list licenses package provided. license list properties name path optionally title. Defaults CC--4.0 license. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. description markdown-formatted string describing package. can (!) use multiple sentences, limited single paragraph. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. homepage (optional) URL home web related data package. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. image (optional) URL path pointing location image representing data package. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. version (optional) version string identifying version package, following Semantic Versioning. Defaults "1.0.0". See Geolocator DP Data Package specification Data Package Version recipe. embargo End date embargo. Default "1970-01-01". See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. keywords (optional) list keywords assist users searching package. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. citation (optional) string providing citation package. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. grants (optional) list grants funded creation package. See Geolocator DP Data Package specification. related_identifiers (optional) list related identifiers package. related identifier list properties relationType relatedIdentifier. See Geolocator DP Camtrap DP specification . references (optional) List references related package (e.g. references cited package.description). References preferably include DOI. See Geolocator DP Camtrap DP specification.

what: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
title: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
text: set functions facilitates reading combining Geolocator Data (GDL) associated order information various sources. main function, read_gdl(), allows reading data Access file directly separate CSV files containing GDL data order information. returns data frame integrates GDL data summarized order details.

title: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
code: read_gdl(access_file = NA, file_data = NA, file_order = NA, filter_col = TRUE)  read_gdl_orders(file_order)  read_gdl_data(file_data)  read_gdl_access(   access_file,   file_data = tempfile("GDL_Data", fileext = "csv"),   file_order = tempfile("GDL_Orders", fileext = "csv") )

title: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
text: access_file string specifying path Access file containing GDL data order information. provided, takes precedence file_data file_order. Defaults NA.  ¬ß file_data string specifying path GDL data file. Required access_file provided. Defaults NA. file_order string specifying path GDL order file. Required access_file provided. Defaults NA. filter_col logical value character vector. TRUE, predefined set columns selected. FALSE, columns included. Alternatively, character vector can passed specify columns select. Defaults TRUE.

title: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
text: data frame combining GDL data summarized order information. data frame includes columns OrderName, Client, NumberDelivered, GDL_ID, Species, , depending value filter_col.

title: Read Geolocator Data and Orders ‚Äî read_gdl
text: read_gdl() function primary interface reading combining GDL data orders. can read Access file separate data order files. Access file provided, read_gdl_access() function used extract GDL data order information. Otherwise, read_gdl_data() read_gdl_orders() functions employed read data specified CSV files. read_gdl(): Reads GDL order data, either Access file separate CSV files, returns combined data frame. read_gdl_orders(): Reads GDL order information CSV file, including columns like OrderID, OrderName, Species, Client, NumberDelivered. read_gdl_data(): Reads GDL data CSV file, including columns like DataID, OrderName, GDL_ID, Species, spatial temporal information. read_gdl_access(): Extracts GDL data order information Access database file exports temporary CSV files.

title: Transform Tags to a Tidy Data Frame ‚Äî tags2m

title: Update a GeoLocator Data Package Metadata ‚Äî update_gldp
text: function performs following updates: Sets created field current date time RFC3339 format. Updates temporal field date range datetime values measurements resource, available. Updates taxonomic field unique, non-missing scientific_name values tags resource, available. Sets reference_location field median latitude longitude values observations resource, available.

Default FALSE. open TRUE, package opened new RStudio session.

title: Create a Geopressure Template Project ‚Äî write_geopressuretemplate
text: path created project directory.

title: Create a Geopressure Template Project ‚Äî write_geopressuretemplate
text: Upon execution, function performs following steps: Creates project directory. Generates DESCRIPTION file using metadata pkg. Creates README file outlines project details. Generates LICENSE file based specified licenses. Writes relevant data files project structure.
